How to Change Lifelong,Self-Defeating Thinking Habits

All new from renowned author
and acclaimed self-help guru Dr. Wayne Dyer. Sometimes affectionately called the "father of motivation" by his fans, he is one of the most widely known and respected people in the field of self-empowerment.

Includes Dr. Dyer's latest appearance on Coast to Coast AM radio show with Dr. Bruce Lipton, famous inventor of Lipton Iced tea..... Well, ok he didn't really invent iced tea, but trust me, he's pretty interesting. C2C called him the "foremost authority in bridging science and spirit, and he talks about how genes and DNA do not control our body, and how MEMES, or mind viruses, are infecting our population...".
It's in a seperate folder, so you can opt to not download it if you just want the main program.
Enjoy! and seed!

FROM THE PUBLISHER
Within the tracks of this transformational CD set, Dr. Wayne W. Dyer reveals how to change the self-defeating thinking patterns that have prevented you from living at the highest levels of success, happiness, and health. Even though you may know what to think, actually changing those thinking habits that have been with you since childhood might be somewhat challenging.

If I changed, it would create family dramas . . . IÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢m too old or too young . . . IÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢m far too busy and tired . . . I canÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t afford the things I truly want . . . It would be very difficult for me to do things differently . . . and IÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ve always been this way . . .
may all seem to be true, but theyÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢re in fact just excuses. So the business of modifying habituated thinking patterns really comes down to tossing out the same tired old excuses and examining your beliefs in a new and truthful light.

In this groundbreaking work, Wayne presents a compendium of conscious and subconscious crutches employed by virtually everyone, along with ways to cast them aside once and for all. Excuses . . . Begone!
